name: RenderEmailTemplateError

methods.name: getFieldName
methods.description: Returns the name of the merge field in the error.

methods.name: getMessage
methods.description: Returns a message describing the error.

methods.name: getOffset
methods.description: Returns the offset within the supplied body text where the error was discovered. If the offset cannot be determined, -1 is returned.

methods.name: getStatusCode
methods.description: Returns a Salesforce API status code.

description: Represents an error that the RenderEmailTemplateBodyResult object can contain.
